global_dangerlink_warning_title: 警告：您将要离开这个应用
global_dangerlink_warning_body_1: eos-voter不能保证您即将访问的网站的安全，请确保您的密钥和帐户信息安全，只有在您确信可以信任时才共享信息.
global_dangerlink_warning_body_2: 务必不要分享你的私钥.
global_dangerlink_warning_body_3: 如想继续，请在下方确认.
global_transaction_complete_message: 您的交易已提交至区块链.
global_transaction_complete_warning_mess: 提交交易并不保证会被确认，为了确保交易在网络中完成并确认，请在资源管理器中引用上述交易ID以确保它进入最后一个不可逆转块.
error_no_stake_left: Unable to set staked amount to 0. Doing so would prevent you from performing any transactions on the network.
error_not_valid_stake_amount: 不是有效的放样金额（必须是正数,最大精度为4位小数,例如12.1212）
error_eosio_assert_message_exception: The EOS blockchain returned a generic error based on your request. Please check that the information is valid and try again.
